title: The book, The True Icon, is now shipping.
post: I got my copy today.  The book does not delve into the scientific aspects of the Shroud, but it is very lavishly illustrated and the black & white closeup of the negative (lifelike)of the face on page 13 is absolutely STUNNING.  Every sindonologist should get this book, which is very reasonably priced for a book with so many great color pictures.
author: Joe Marino
